snippet: Chardonnays made in stainless-steel tanks, produced at many Long Island wineries, are light, contrasting sharply with the heavy California version.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews several chardonnays made in stainless steel tanks at Long Island wineries (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Chardonnays made in stainless-steel tanks, produced at many Long Island wineries, are light, contrasting sharply with the heavy California version.

headline.seo: Long Island Chardonnays From Stainless-Steel Tanks
